task.title: Choice List Example
task.shortdesc: When writing task topics, the choice list structure can be used to describe alternative step choices.

taskbody.context: In this document, you will learn to add digital signature on a PDF form.

step.cmd: Open the PDF document or form in Acrobat or Acrobat Reader.
Click Fill & Sign in the right pane.
Click the Sign icon in the Fill & Sign toolbar and add your signature.
Add your signature in Signature or Initials panel.

choices.choice: Type: Type your name in the field. You can choose from a small selection of signature styles.
Draw: Draw your signature in the field.
Image: Browse and select an image of your signature.

step.cmd: Select the Save Signature check box.
step.stepresult: The added signature is saved for reuse.

step.cmd: Click Apply, and then click at the place in the PDF where you want to place the signature or initial.
